name: Digitizer
description:
Digitizer is a Sci-Fi action RPG set in a post-capitalist open-world, where a constant war between classes and factions has destroyed most of the world's cities and left islands of Hightech fortresses surrounded by masses of poor survivors.

Pick your side and fight to support those who have the right to survive, fight for the future you want as new technology rises that can preserve or destroy what is left of the old world.
This technology is able to give the common and poor survivers eternal life inside a simulated reality, but the price is high, they will lose their biological life in the process. will you support this technology along with its inventor and the city sponsors? or will you join the resistance and restore the old world order. the choice is yours and the Digitizer fate is in your hands.

The game features:
First and third-person control. driving in first-person.
Fighting with ranged, melee, and car-mounted-machine-guns,
Inventory system with weight calculations, trade, and crafting.
Day-night, and change time systems,
Talking NPS's with branching dialogues, and story options, without cutscenes.
Player character customizations, and clothing switching.
Stats, perks, and skills to develop as you level up,
Fast travel, maps, and location discovery system.
